mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from lendboard where title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or contents like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by seq desc) A where ROWNUM <= 5) where rnum >= 1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from borrowboard where address1 like '%'||#{search}||'%' or title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or contents like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by seq desc) A where ROWNUM <= 5) where rnum >= 1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from talentboard where category like '%'||#{search}||'%' or title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or contents like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by seq desc) A where ROWNUM <= 5) where rnum >= 1
